front.extra:
for Respondent No. 1
--------------------------------------------------------------
CORAM : MR.JUSTICE C.K.THAKKAR
Date of decision:

This petition is filed by the petitioner against
issuance of notice dated 13th of January, 1999, Annexure
`F' to the petition and by permanently restraining the
Gujarat Electricity Board and its Officers, servants and
nominees from taking any action pursuant to the said
